colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (ME LHA LA MCHOD PA 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA ' DI NI, 'JIG RTEN PA RNAMS PHYUGS SKYE 'PHEL GYI SKABS GOD KHA BZLOG PA LA LUGS 'DI LA DANG BA SHIN TU CHE BAR 'DUG PAS, ,'JIG RTEN PA LUGS KYI ME LHA MCHOD TSUL DE 'DRA MA YIN PA, CHOS DANG 'BREL BA'I ME LHA MCHOD TSUL ZHIG SGRIGS ZHING @007A *, ,RANG GI GRVA PA YE SHES BLO LDAN DANG, BLO BZANG RIGS GROL GNYIS KYI 'DOD PA BSGRUB PHYIR, ^CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BDAG GIS BLA MA GZHAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I ME LHA'I MCHOD TSUL LA GZHI BYAS, 'JIG RTEN PA RNAMS KYI 'PHRAL GYI GOD KHA BZLOG PA LA PHAN PAR BSAM NAS SGRIGS PA LA, NONGS PA'I TSOGS CI MCHIS PA SPYAN LDAN MKHAS DANG, YE SHES ME LHA'I TSOGS LA BSHAGS, YI GE PA NI AER KHE PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO,, ,,)
